jff.gui
Class JFFMainFrameImpl.JFFBundledItems

java.lang.Object
  jff.gui.JFFMainFrameImpl.JFFBundledItems
Enclosing class:
JFFMainFrameImpl
public class JFFMainFrameImpl.JFFBundledItems
extends java.lang.Object

A convenient group of the application items used to exchange all the data between actions and tables. It contains a:

  • JFFStrings that contains the actual translation for the strings to be displayed
  • JFFGroupSelectableVideoFile that contains the video files to be showed on the files table
  • FFMultipleGroupTask that contains the tasks info
  • FFOptions that contains the options with whom a new task will be created
  • A RestartableThread that will execute the tasks
  • A RestartableThread that will refresh the data displayed on the gui
Beware that the Refresher thread has to be inizialized separately after the construction of the tables. Otherwise a nullPointerException will be thrown

Version:
%I%
Author:
Francesco Fornasini
